amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate prohibition of award of attorney fees which otherwise would be recoverable under Equal Access to Justice Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 113-271 to eliminate prohibition of award of attorney fees which otherwise would be recoverable under Equal Access to Justice Act.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 225 (Roll no. 596).
